title: Kyou, Koi wo Hajimemasu (Today We Start Our Love)
synopsis: Hibino Tsubaki is a shy, kind, and slightly old-fashioned girl who has always been the top student in her class. She always did everything her parents wanted her to do. She loved to do other girls' hair in trendy and cute styles, despite always wearing plain braids herself.
staff: [['Yamauchi, Shigeyasu', ['Director', ' Episode Director', ' Storyboard']], ['Itou, Kanae', ['Theme Song Performance']], ['French Kiss', ['Theme Song Performance']], ['Minami, Kanan', ['Original Creator']]]
